title: Cox Sports Report - 10/5/15 Episode
text: Cox Sports Report - 10/5/15 Episode Special to VirginiaPreps.com Special to VirginiaPreps.com Related Links: Talk about it in V. I. P. - 'MEMBERS ONLY' CLUB In its eighth season, the Cox Sports Report showcases detailed highlights of High School Football games from across the Tidewater area weekly and has now expanded its reach to include action from Roanoke and Northern Virginia as well. Hosted by Matthew Hatfield and Andy Mashaw, the nationally syndicated show can be seen in homes around Virginia every Monday evening at 6:00 and 11:00 PM EST with encore presentations throughout the week. Select highlights and interviews are also available on Cox on Demand and on the Cox 11 YouTube Channel here . Check out the October 5th show below . . . Lafayette 40, York 0 (0:49 mark) Grassfield 17, Western Branch 14 (5:02 mark) Cox at Practice at Indian River (9:45 mark) Salem 14, Green Run 0 (15:42 mark) Rod Johnson Interview (19:36 mark) Player of the Week (23:29 mark)
